Text:
Lovely theme, indeed!  But I Still do nt know, how to download a file, in the first place!  What format does a Torrent-File?  What browser or player can read or show the contents? How can -I upload my files, for others to share?

Thanks to all contributors!

u need a torrent client like
utorrent ( a lite one for windows only)

google them
